headerDisplay: Gate Opener for homebridge for PalGate APP users

deviceId.title: Gate ID
deviceId.description: Use ./palGateCli.js config to link your device and find the Gate IDs

token.title: Token
token.description: Use ./palGateCli.js config to link your device and generate the required token.

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.description: Put the phone number for your account here (eg 972500000000)

tokenType.title: Token Type
tokenType.description: Set to 0 for SMS, 1 for Primary or 2 for Secondary.

accessoryType.title: Accessory Type
accessoryType.description: How do you wish to represent the gate in HomeKit? default: garageDoor

name.title: Gate name, e.g Parking Gate
name.description: Please provide a name to your gate, default: Parking Gate
